item.title: Spotify swings to a profit as subscribers top estimates
item.description: The streaming service reported a double-digit rise in monthly active users.

item.title: Trump has two strong options to defuse the U.S. debt time-bomb. He should use them.
item.description: AI-fueled productivity growth, combined with realistic and constructive immigration reform, would put the U.S. economy on more solid footing.

item.title: PepsiCo’s revenue misses amid ‘subdued’ trends and Quaker Oats recall fallout
item.description: PepsiCo’s stock falls after revenue misses expectations for a third-straight quarter, amid “subdued” performance trends in North America.
